author: kwright
msg: Expiration of database handles closes connections; if those throw any unusual exceptions, database handles could be lost from the pool.  Part of CONNECTORS-638.

msg: CAMEL-6045: Fixed mail binding to extract attachments if disposition is null but fileName is given. Thanks to Christoph Giera for the patch.
